description: Primes p such that 11 is not a square mod p.
comments: Also, only entries p = 1 (mod 4) of the sequence are not squares mod 11 (from the quadratic reciprocity law). - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jul 21 2004Except for 2, inert primes in Z[sqrt(11)]. 2 splits as (-1)*(3 - sqrt(11))*(3 + sqrt(11)). - _Alonso del Arte_, Jan 02 2015
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 08 2012
